description: Try our easy to follow Jeweled Fried Rice With Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Jeweled Fried Rice With Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g pork sausages, meat removed from casing

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse rice under cold running water until the water runs clear. Place into saucepan with 2 cups water. Cover and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and cook for about 12 minutes or until the water has been absorbed. Transfer rice to a large tray, spreading out thinly to cool for 20 minutes, turning occasionally. Alternatively cool, covered overnight in the fridge.

Heat 1 tsp oil in large a non-stick wok or frying pan and cook sausage meat over medium heat for 8 minutes, tossing occasionally. Remove sausage meat to a plate. Add 1 tsp of oil over high heat, add egg and cook for 2 minutes or until set. Slide egg onto a board, roll up and shred. Set aside.

Heat remaining oil over high heat and add corn, carrot, broccolini, ginger and chilli. Toss for 5 minutes. Add rice and snow peas and cook for 3 minutes, tossing to combine and reheat rice thoroughly. Return sausage to wok with combined soy sauce and sesame oil. Toss well over high heat for 1 minute. Serve topped with egg and spring onion.
